feed.title: Category: Autotools | Living a Simple Life is a Happy Life

entry.title: How to Compile by Autotools
entry.content:
虽然因为llvm的出现，开源工具链又开始慢慢进化了，但是很多项目还是需要autotools自动gen configure的，但是我每次命令都记不全，还是记一下吧

``` #!/bin/bash

echo “Running aclocal…” aclocal || exit 1 echo “Running autoheader…” autoheader || exit 1 echo “Running autoconf…” autoconf || exit 1 echo “Running automake…” automake –add-missing –copy || exit 1 echo “Finished.”

```
